name: Kali's Wrath
description:
Kali is summoned to defeat an unstoppable Asura, who regenerates a new clone every time a single blood drop touches the ground.  Suck up all the blood, use it to unleash Kali's power, and kill every last copy to win.  

WASD - Move

J - Strike

K - Charge/Suck Blood

L - Unleash Power
